data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in National Capital District, Papua New Guinea from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of National Capital District, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in National Capital District who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.section_summary: On average, 58 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who might know about God culturally, but likely have no relationship with Jesus in National Capital District, Papua New Guinea.
data.prayer: Jesus, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 70,724 believers in National Capital District, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 70,724 believers in National Capital District against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.
Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Jew, English-speaking people.
Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of National Capital District, Papua New Guinea to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Father, help the 70,724 believers in National Capital District to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.focus_label: National Capital District, Papua New Guinea
data.section_summary:
the state of National Capital District, Papua New Guinea has a population of 307,600.

We estimate National Capital District has 70,724 people who might know Jesus, 219,590 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 17,286 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of National Capital District to agree with you and with one another in love.
data.verse: that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.
